pages.text: This version of the $(l:naval_warfare:game_requirements/game_interactor)Game Interactor/$ works mostly the same, with a few differences. It is mostly used during testing when I don't have anyone available to test something, but still need a second player somehow (I'm not buying an alt account just for testing). Only use this if you know what you're doing, you may encounter issues otherwise...

You can 'simulate' a second player as follows:$(li)Spawn a Game Controller using '/setblock x y z naval_warfare:game_controller' to spawn a game controller without an owner.$(li)Right Click the dummy game interactor on the controller to set the dummy owner.$(br)You can now use either version of the game interactor to interact with the controller. Using the dummy version will prevent most messages from appearing twice.
